channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2025011244
item.description:
Report X-2025011244

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-31T00:56:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-21
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENT WAS PERFORMING AN OBSERVATION OF OPERATIONS WHEN THEY FLAGGED A PACKAGE AS SUSPICIOUS AND REQUESTED CONTENT INSPECTION. THE PACKAGE WAS WRAPPED WITH BROWN KRAFT PAPER. ANCHORAGE UPS SECURITY LEAD OPENED THE PACKAGE FOR INSPECTION. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED A TOTAL OF SEVENTEEN CANISTERS OF #11 EXPLOSIVE PERCUSSION CAPS. THERE ARE ALSO FOUR PACKETS OF #11 REVOLVER NIPPLES AND ONE PAIR OF EQUATE +2.00 READER GLASSES. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER PACKAGING.THE PACKAGE WAS FLOWN ON UPS AIRCRAFT FROM SDF TO ANC.

item.title: Report X-2025010969
item.description:
Report X-2025010969

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-31T00:56:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-03
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package was denied clearance by US Customs. Customs brought package to the area that we dispose of packages. Before the package was disposed of it was discovered to have undecalred DG. The package was then brought to the DG area and is being held.
